thread.title: If You Don’t Know the Team, Don’t Wear the Cap

author: Joe Queenan
title: If You Don’t Know the Team, Don’t Wear the Cap
text:
I am baffled and chagrined by the number of times I engage strangers in good-natured banter in response to the sports regalia they are wearing—only to end up stymied and embarrassed.
Last week I was walking through a lovely gorge in Colorado when I bumped into a man wearing a Kansas City Chiefs cap. At the time I was in Eagles headgear. “Hey, you’ve got a Kelce, and we’ve got a Kelce!” I beamed, alluding to the Chiefs’ outstanding tight end, Travis, and his slightly less gifted brother Jason, who plays center for the Philadelphia...
